creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: two sections; both have geometric embroiderey patterns in shades of pink with black; top has a 2-1/2" embroidered square appliqued to lower center; similar squares are on reverse lower corners of bottom section; black border and lining; ties at middle and bottom; pounded indigo
title: Baby Carrier
